snippet: A huge wildfire in and around Yosemite National Park was caused by an illegal fire set by a hunter, the United States Forest Service said.
abstract: United States Forest Service says huge wildfire in and around Yosemite National Park was caused by an illegal fire set by a hunter; no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: A huge wildfire in and around Yosemite National Park was caused by an illegal fire set by a hunter, the United States Forest Service said.

headline.main: California: Officials Say Hunter Started Wildfire at Yosemite
headline.print_headline: California: Officials Say Hunter Started Wildfire at Yosemite
